name: Star Fighter (itch) (the_allfather)
description:
Unfortunately there is a bug where you cant go higher than level 3 :(((

Comment what your high score was!!

In a world where less is more, the player has to decide between more health or more access to weapons. Find pickups to levelup, allowing you get cooler, newer, strong weapons. Careful though, youll lose health each time you decide to go up a level!
